TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit CatalogPart extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part
Public MustInherit Class CatalogPart Inherits Part

summary.span: 用作驻留在 区域的控件的基类，这些控件提供用户可添加到网页的可用 Web 服务器控件（尤其是 控件）的目录。

span.span: Serves as the base class for controls that reside in zones, and that provide catalogs of available Web server controls (especially controls) that users can add to a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是位于区域中的特殊控件的基类 。The class is a base class for special controls that reside in zones. 这些派生 控件提供最终用户可添加到网页的 web 服务器控件的目录。These derived controls provide catalogs of Web server controls that end users can add to a Web page. 如果要向最终用户提供灵活的方法来通过添加或删除服务器控件来更改网页的功能，请使用 Web 应用程序中的控件。Use controls in a Web application when you want to provide end users with the flexibility to change the functionality of a Web page by adding or removing server controls. 目录只是一个或多个可用 Web 服务器控件的列表 (包括 控件、ASP.NET 服务器控件以及用户可添加到网页) 的自定义控件或用户控件。A catalog is simply a list of one or more available Web server controls (including controls, ASP.NET server controls, and custom or user controls) that users can add to a Web page. 目录有许多常见特征，包括最终用户的说明文本;用于描述每个服务器控件的文本;帮助器控件选择服务器控件并将它们添加到页;公共页眉、页脚和边框;和多个样式属性。A catalog has a number of common characteristics, including instruction text for end users; text to describe each server control; helper controls to select the server controls and add them to the page; a common header, footer, and border; and a number of style attributes. Web 部件控件集提供三种类型的控件，如下表所述。There are three types of controls provided with the Web Parts control set, as described in the following table. 每种类型的 控件都包含从不同源添加到页面的服务器控件。Each type of control contains server controls that are added to a page from a different source. > [!IMPORTANT] > 从类继承的控件只能 驻留在派生自类的区域中 。Controls that inherit from the class can reside only in zones derived from the class. |控制Control|说明Description| |-------------|-----------------| ||包含已在页面上关闭的控件，并且可以重新打开 (添加回用户) 的用户。Contains controls that have been closed on a page, and that can be reopened (added back to the page) by users. 此类型目录中的控件是已从另一个源添加到页面，然后由用户关闭的控件。The controls in this type of catalog are controls that were already added to the page from another source, and were then closed by a user.| ||包含在控件中声明的服务器控件 ，该控件本身包含在网页 标记的区域中。Contains server controls declared within a control, which is itself contained in a zone in the markup of a Web page.| ||为用户提供用户界面 (UI) ，以使用户能够将控件的定义文件 (架构定义的 XML 文件（该文件包含) 到目录的状态信息）上传到该控件，以便可以将该控件添加到网页中。Provides the user interface (UI) for a user to upload a control's definition file (an XML file defined by a schema, that contains state information) to a catalog, so that the control can be added to a Web page. 控件本身不显示在此类目录中;目录只是一种用于访问外部控件定义文件的机制，以便将其添加到页面中。The controls themselves do not appear in this type of catalog; the catalog is just a mechanism for accessing the definition files for external controls so they can be added to a page.| 类从基类继承 ，因此它具有 Web 部件控件集中的其他部件控件的常见行为。The class inherits from the base class, so that it has the common behavior of other part controls in the Web Parts control set. 此外，它还添加了一些适用于目录功能的成员。In addition, it adds some members that are useful for the catalog functionality. 属性获取当前显示为控件标题的实际字符串。The property gets the actual string that is currently being displayed as the title of the control. 此属性的值可以与属性的值相同， 如果没有分配给该属性的值，则为 .NET Framework 提供的默认值。The value of this property can be the same as the value of the property or, if no value has been assigned to that property, a default value supplied by the .NET Framework. 和 属性都提供对控制控件生命周期的两个基本对象的方便访问 ： 分别是控件和 包含控件的区域 。The and properties both provide convenient access to the two essential objects that control the life cycle of a control: the control, and the zone that contains the control, respectively. 类还包含若干方法。The class also contains several methods. 此 方法声明为必须由继承者实现的抽象方法。The method is declared as an abstract method that must be implemented by inheritors. 其预期目的是在目录中返回控件说明的集合。Its intended purpose is to return a collection of descriptions of the controls in the catalog. 相关方法 也被声明为抽象的，并且必须由继承者实现。A related method, , is also declared as abstract and must be implemented by inheritors. 此方法用于 基于作为参数传递给方法的说明返回控件的实例。This method is intended to return an instance of a control based on a description that is passed to the method as a parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class. 由于类是抽象的，因此不能在代码中直接使用。Because the class is abstract, it is not used directly in code. 但是，该示例演示如何使用 Web 部件控件集提供的三个派生控件来演示常见的使用方案。However, the example shows how to work with the three derived controls provided with the Web Parts control set to demonstrate common usage scenarios. 此代码示例分为四个部分：There are four parts to the code example: - 使您能够更改网页上的显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to change display modes on the Web page. - 网页，其中包含 与 Web 部件控件集一起提供的三个控件，它们都在网页上的中声明 。A Web page, which contains the three controls provided with the Web Parts control set, all declared within a on a Web page. 此页还包含一个 控件，该控件具有 在区域中声明的控件。The page also contains a control, with an control declared in the zone. - 一个 XML 文件，其中包含在网页上的控件中显示的引文 。An XML file that contains quotations displayed in the control on the Web page. - 有关如何运行该示例的说明。An explanation of how to run the example. 此代码示例的第一部分是用户控件，该控件使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 应将此代码保存在一个名为 DisplayModeMenuCS 或 DisplayModeMenuVB 的文件中 (具体取决于你使用) 的语言。You should save this code in a file named DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx or DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx (depending on which language you are using). 有关显示模式的详细信息以及此控件中源代码的说明，请参阅 [演练：在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_CatalogPart_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPart_Overview/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_CatalogPart_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPart_Overview/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#5)] 此代码示例的第二部分是网页。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 页面包含一个 控件，并在子元素中 `` 声明了与 Web 部件控件集一起提供的三个控件中的每一个。The page contains a control, and within the child `` element, each of the three controls provided with the Web Parts control set is declared. 某些属性是在控件上设置的 ，也在 \

para.span: 由于 类是抽象类，因此不能直接在网页上使用它。

span.span: Because the class is abstract, you cannot use it directly on a Web page.

para.span: Web 部件控件集提供了三个 控件 (在本主题的 "备注" 部分的表中列出，) 派生自基类，可用于 Web 部件页。

span.span: The Web Parts control set provides three controls (listed in the table in the Remarks section of this topic) that derive from the base class and that can be used on Web Parts pages.

para.span: 这些控件应提供创建 Web 服务器控件目录所需的大部分功能。

span.span: These controls should provide most of the features needed to create catalogs of Web server controls.

para.span: 不过，您可能需要开发自定义 控件。

span.span: However, you might have specialized needs that would require developing a custom control.

para.span: 例如，可以创建一种特殊类型的 控件，使服务器控件可通过 Web 服务或直接从数据库使用。

span.span: For example, you can create a special type of control that makes server controls available through a Web service, or directly from a database.

para.span: 为此，必须从 类继承。

span.span: To do this, you must inherit from the class.

para.span: 还必须重写抽象 方法和 方法，以提供返回 或其他服务器控件的实现及其说明。

span.span: You must also override the abstract and methods to provide an implementation that returns the or other server controls, and their descriptions.

para.span: 还需要方法从数据库或 Web 服务加载各种服务器控件。

span.span: You will also need methods to load the various server controls from your database or Web service.

related.span: 演练：开发和使用自定义服务器控件

span.span: Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Server Control

related.span: 演练：在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式

span.span: Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DisplayTitle As String
public: property System::String ^ DisplayTitle { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个字符串，其中包含 控件的实际当前标题。

span.span: Gets a string that contains the actual current title of a control.

value.span: 一个表示控件的完整可见标题的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the complete, visible title of the control.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控件没有标题，则属性返回基属性的当前值， 或者为计算的值。The property returns either the current value of the base property or, if the control has no title, a calculated value. 属性设计为只读的计算属性，可在运行时获取所显示标题的实际当前值。The property is designed to be a read-only, calculated property to get the actual current value of the displayed title at run time. 因此，不应尝试使用此属性来设置控件的标题 。Therefore, you should not attempt to use this property to set a title for a control. 若要设置标题，请使用基本 属性。To set a title, use the base property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the property. 在 `

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection GetAvailableWebPartDescriptions() cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetAvailableWebPartDescriptions () As WebPartDescriptionCollection

summary.span: 返回目录中可用 控件的说明的集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of descriptions of the available controls in a catalog.

returns.span: 一个 ，它包含目录中每个控件的 。

span.span: A that contains a for each control in a catalog.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回目录中每个控件的说明信息。The method returns description information for each control in a catalog. 对象是一个轻型对象，其中包含有关控件的基本信息 ，包括控件的 ID、对控件的对象引用，以及从基类继承的几个重要属性的值 ，例如 和 。A object is a lightweight object that contains essential information about a control, including its ID, an object reference to the control, and the values of several important properties that are inherited from the base class, such as and . 方法可提高性能。The method improves performance. 创建目录时，它需要一些有关它所包含的每个控件的信息，包括标题、描述、图标 (（如果存在）) 和 ID。When a catalog is created, it needs some information about each control it contains, including a title, a description, an icon (if one exists), and an ID. 调用方可以使用 方法，该方法只返回有关每个控件的说明信息，而无需创建每个控件的实例即可获取此信息。Rather than having to create an instance of each control to get this information, a caller can use the method, which returns only the description information about each control.

para.span: 方法是抽象的，因此它必须由派生控件实现 。

span.span: The method is abstract, so it must be implemented by derived controls.

para.span: 此方法由包含控件的区域 和关联的 对象在区域的内容呈现时调用 。

span.span: This method is called by the zone that contains a control, and by an associated object when the contents of a zone are rendered.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Collections.IDictionary GetDesignModeState() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function GetDesignModeState () As IDictionary

summary.span: 检索 控件父区域的当前状态。

span.span: Retrieves the current state of a control's parent zone.

returns.span: 一个 ，其中包含 控件所在的 区域的当前状态。

span.span: An that contains the current state of the zone that contains a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回有关包含控件的区域的状态信息 。The method returns information about the state of the zone that contains a control. 以字典形式返回状态信息。The state information is returned in the form of a dictionary.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart GetWebPart(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription description) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetWebPart (description As WebPartDescription) As WebPart

span.span: A that contains a reference to a specific .

summary.span: 从目录中检索 控件，该控件由传递给方法的 对象引用。

span.span: Retrieves from a catalog the control that is referenced by the object passed to the method.
A that is referenced by the object in the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法 从目录返回一个控件。The method returns a control from a catalog. 传递给方法的对象匹配特定的 控件，并使该控件可由方法返回。The object that is passed to the method matches a specific control and enables that control to be returned by the method. 如果目录中包含不是从类派生的服务器控件 ，如 ASP.NET 服务器控件、自定义服务器控件或用户控件，则 控件必须使用控件包装服务器控件 ，并 从此方法返回控件。If a catalog contains a server control that does not derive from the class, such as an ASP.NET server control, a custom server control, or a user control, a control must wrap the server control with a control, and return the control from this method.

para.span: 方法是抽象的，因此它必须由派生控件实现 。

span.span: The method is abstract, so it must be implemented by derived controls.

para.span: 此方法由包含控件的区域 、关联的 对象和网页 上的对象调用。

span.span: This method is called by the zone that contains a control, by an associated object, and by the object on a Web page.

summary.span: 获取对包含 控件的 区域的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to the zone that contains a control.

value.span: 一个 ，它对应于包含控件的区域。

span.span: A that corresponds to the zone that contains the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使 控件能够获取对其区域的引用。The property enables a control to get a reference to its zone. 尽管属性是只读的，但可通过编程方式更改区域本身的基础属性。Although the property is read-only, the underlying properties of the zone itself can be changed programmatically.
